content: *français en bas* **description** *the paid version provides 2 pdfs french and english if you choose the paid version the english pdf is printer friendly 15 pages instead of 35 on the website * i present you casper and parch these two elf mice are adorable have such unique personalities and are so much fun to knit up casper is very festive and outgoing in his red and blue outfit whereas parch has more of a gypsy vibe with his woodsy color scheme the elf mouse is knit in the round bottom up there is minimal sewing the arms and tail are worked separately then knitted with body the ears are knit by picking up marked stitches the eyes can be embroidered or 4 5mm safety eyes can be inserted the nose and mouth are embroidered the hat is knit in the round the tunic and pants are knit flat then seamed at just 6 inches 15 cm tall this project is a great stash buster and it knits up pretty quickly **material** sample 1 red hat and blue shirt blue sky fibers woolstok light 100% fine highland wool 218yd/199m per 50g skein mc 2303 highland fleece approximately 0 2 skein cc 2320 spring ice approximately 0 2 skein cc2 2315 red rock approximately 0 2 skein **skill level** intermediate - **description** *ce patron est **maintenant disponible en français** l achat inclus deux pdfs la version française sur 13 pages et la version anglaise sur 15 pages plutôt que 35 pages en anglais uniquement sur le site web * je vous présente casper et parch ces deux souris lutins sont adorables ont leur personnalité unique et sont si amusantes à tricoter casper est plutôt festif et extraverti en bleu et rouge tandis que parch dégage un air bohémien **matériel** échantillon 2 tuque pourpre et chandail vert madelinetosh unicorn tails 100% merino wool 52yd/48m par 14g skein cp dustweaver approx 0 5 écheveau cc1 oak approx 0 3 écheveau cc2 penumbra approx 0 5 écheveau cc3 well water approx 0 3 écheveau cc4 filtered day dreams approx 0 3 écheveau **niveau de compétence** intermédiaire
